name: Beaver Battle!
description:
a Dam good tower defense game! play against one of your friends in an epic battle against each other. One of you will try to invade, while the other will try their best to defend. Each of you will get cool special power ups which help you get to your goal. Have fun playing it!

You need two controllers for this!

Credits for the beautiful itch page art to maaari. Check her out on insta as @maaarinetherlands
